amendment.description: To provide up to $13,000,000 for conflict resolution, rule of law and democracy activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1860 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1860 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S12794) To provide up to $13,000,000 for conflict resolution, rule of law and democracy activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1860 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1860 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Harkin.
